Quincy.Blue Hills State Police Barracks Station: The Blue Hills State Police Barracks is on Hillside Street in Milton, Massachusetts. It houses the police and patrol offices of the Blue Hills Reservation, a Massachusetts state park administered by the Massachusetts Department of Conservation and Recreation (DCR). The ​1 1⁄2-story building was designed by Stickney & Austin and built in 1904 out of Quincy granite.
